title: [管理][娱乐][综合]SimpleParticles —— 200多种的粒子特效[1.8X-1.9]
author: 602844218qq
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 11:21 编辑 

什么？200多种的粒子特效？曾经想要一个简单的插件使用粒子吗? 厌倦了那些高级插件太贵吗? 那么你来对地方了。妈妈再也不用担心我不能装逼了！先上图！简单的GUI界面




如何安装:
1)下载插件
2)把插件的插件文件夹
3)重新启动/重新加载服务
4)配置权


SimpleParticles.reload  重新获得配置SimpleParticles.*        获得全部权限输入/SP打开特效面板

权限



SimpleParticles。 *——给访问所有插件的功能
SimpleParticles.Particles。 *——提供访问所有粒子效果和形状
SimpleParticles.Circle。 *——给访问所有圆形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Tornado。 *——给访问所有龙卷风形成的粒子
SimpleParticles.Swirl。 *——给访问所有漩涡形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Ring。 *——给访问所有环形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Random。 *——提供访问所有随机形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Trail。 *——给访问所有轨迹形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Wing。 *——给访问所有机翼形状的粒子
SimpleParticles.Cone。 *——给访问所有锥形状的粒子
SimpleParticles。 重载——给重新加载配置访问
[color=inherit !important]个人的权限你必须有以下:
SimpleParticles。 <形状(区分大小写)>。 < particleName(小写)>——给访问某些粒子和形状
[color=inherit !important]都是大小写敏感的你可以让他们通过查看菜单项名称。 项目名称设置:<形> - < particleName >

更新日志
New particle shape and moreAdded:
- GroundSpiral particle shape
- Ability to toggle what particles are able to be used
- Ability to change the messages

Fixed:
- The permissions (see my site for more details on the permissions)
- Error sending in console when someone clicks in the inventory (Should work I am getting no errors in my TestServer console)

Changed:
- Changed the Updater (and Metrics) class so it now says the plugins name (Will soon be for all my plugins)New Shape and fixesAdded:
- Cone shape particle that makes a cone from the floor up and resets when the particles meet.
- Metrics and new Update checker
Fixed:
- InventoryClickEvent error
- some performance problems

Changed:
-The note particle now has random colors instead of 1 solid color.

Removed:
- The note particle from the Random and Cone particle list (Will Work in the others just wont work in those two shapes).


More particles and updated Permissions.txtAdded:
- More particles for 1.8 and 1.9 versions (works on both)
- Wing particles
Changed:
- Permissions.txt to show the permissions not effected by the new permissions

permissions:
SimpleParticles.*:
description: Permission to ALL
children:
SimpleParticles.Particles.*: true
SimpleParticles.reload: true
SimpleParticles.Particles.*:
description: Permission to ALL
children:
SimpleParticles.Circle.*: true
SimpleParticles.Ring.*: true...brainsynder, Mar 2, 2016... Read More
Fixes and deleted files preparing for all around customization!!!Added:
- New All 1.9 particles to selection
- Added detection for server version to see what particles get enabled
- New way for me to add particles

Fixed:
- particle menu not working on 1.8

Changed:
- Removed a ton of files
- Permissions changed.....
---- How to get the new permissions ----
KeyStep-->
SimpleParticles.<Shape (on the main page of /simpleparticles)>.<particleName (found in all pages must be exact)>

Particle name found here:
---- Example:
[Swirl] - happyVillager
So the...brainsynder, Mar 2, 2016... Read More
Big Changes And 1.9 Changes!!!Added:
- DragonBreath particle to all types
- Permissions.txt file with all permissions.
- I am going to start recoding this so the file size is lower and much more customization!
- Server version check for particle implementation

Fixed:
- 1.8 particles not working on 1.9 servers

Changed:
API:
- Added ALL 1.9 particles
- New way to call the api.
- And more!brainsynder, Mar 1, 2016
A new particle typeAdded a new particle type called: Trail

Permissions:
SimpleParticles.Trail.*
SimpleParticles.Trail.Flame
SimpleParticles.Trail.LavaDrip
SimpleParticles.Trail.WaterDrip
SimpleParticles.Trail.Smoke
SimpleParticles.Trail.Hearts
SimpleParticles.Trail.Note
SimpleParticles.Trail.Cloud
SimpleParticles.Trail.Redstone
SimpleParticles.Trail.Happy
SimpleParticles.Trail.Fireworks
SimpleParticles.Trail.Angry
SimpleParticles.Trail.RGBbrainsynder, Feb 22, 2016
Catscraft.net likes this.New Particle shape!!!Added a new shape called Tornado!!!
With more permissions!!!! YAY!!!

SimpleParticles.Tornado.Happy

SimpleParticles.Tornado.Angrybrainsynder, Jan 26, 2016
Catscraft.net likes this.More Particles, Website docs, and API!!!- New particle type (Random)
- Added an API for developers
- More permissions: YAY!!!
- SimpleParticles Website!!!brainsynder, Jan 24, 2016
Catscraft.net likes this.New particle shape and more- New particle shape (Rings)
- New particle (RGB custom)
- more permissions (YAY!)
- and more.brainsynder, Jan 23, 2016
Catscraft.net likes this.More particles and additions- New particles total of 11 so far and counting.
- More permissions
- Changed the file system
- Much easier for me to add particles now.brainsynder, Jan 19, 2016Catscraft.net likes this

确实有200多种特效，
是因为特效运行的方式不同 (9*25)
发现spigot1.9运行时的bug
1.如果不点击特效，而点击周围的玻璃、自己的物品、菜单外的空白处，
都会引起服务端刷屏。
